data.title: Japan passes a democracy-muzzling Patriot Act. The Obama-supported State Secret Bill criminalizes investigative journalism and conflates terrorism with ‘imposing one’s opinions.’
Austrian Mayor Says That Journalists Who Report on Asylum-Seekers Should Be "Hanged Like Jews"
NSA surveillance allegations have led to countries questioning the country's commitment to Internet freedom, a former Obama official says

A march yesterday at the University of London ended in kettling, arrests and blood on the pavement after a week of alleged police brutality finally has video footage to accompany what has been going on.

David Cameron's involvement with the federation of conservative student group, of which he was a high ranking member at the time, in creating a poster calling for Nelson Mandela to be hanged in 1985 is once again being highlighted since his recent comments regarding Mandela's death.
Snowden to make video appearance at EU parliament
Australian Politicians Call For TPP Text To Be Made Public Before It's Signed
New law allows same-sex couples in Australia to be married
Police In Thailand Lay Down Vests and Barricades In Solidarity With Protestors
